alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 3:33PM AKDT until November 05 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 45 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Prince William Sound, including Valdez and Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will continue for the next few hours. Winds are expected to remain gusty through the overnight hours before gradually decreasing Sunday morning. Blowing and drifting snow could locally reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
